video.title: Horseland
video.synopsis: Welcome to Horseland, home of gorgeous steeds whose human friends have fun learning about good sportsmanship, friendship and responsibility.

episodes.synopsis: The kids reminisce about the first day Sarah arrived at Horseland, and how they all assumed she'd be a stuck-up snob like Chloe and Zoey.
episodes.title: You Can't Judge a Girl By Her Limo

episodes.synopsis: When Alma skips several practices, she has a run of disappointing results in a fence-jumping event and tries to pass off the blame for her failure.
episodes.title: Win Some, Lose Some

episodes.synopsis: When Molly takes a bad fall, she puts off getting back in the saddle again, but she must finally face her fears.
episodes.title: Back In the Saddle Again

episodes.synopsis: Alma gets a reputation for "crying wolf," which is only partly deserved. When she actually sees a wolf on a trail ride, no one will believe her.
episodes.title: Cry Wolf

episodes.synopsis: When Chloe and Zoey shirk their responsibilities on a camping trip, the result is a forest fire that puts everyone in jeopardy.
episodes.title: Fire, Fire Burning Bright

episodes.synopsis: Zoey is displeased with Molly's performance in a team event and tricks the rest of her ride-mates into dropping Molly from the team.
episodes.title: Fast Friends

episodes.synopsis: When Pepper gets hurt during a jumping exercise, Zoey turns her back on her, although it's obvious to everyone else that Pepper will soon get well.
episodes.title: Pepper's Pain

episodes.synopsis: When a casual remark by Chloe is misinterpreted, all of Horseland mistakenly thinks she's mastered a complex series of jumps.
episodes.title: The Awful Truth

episodes.synopsis: When Horseland must choose one rider to represent the stable in a big Western riding competition, Chloe and Zoey's competitiveness is communicable.
episodes.title: The Competition

episodes.synopsis: Sarah's positive attitude is tested by a difficult dressage move, a lateral step that she and Scarlet can't quite get. In time, Sarah loses patience.
episodes.title: The Can-Do Kid

episodes.synopsis: Molly's city friends want to watch her compete, but Molly is worried that they will embarrass her because they won't know how to be "good spectators."
episodes.title: The Best Loss

episodes.synopsis: Bailey's been put in charge for a day, and he lets it go to his head. He turns into a control freak and makes the other kids' lives difficult.
episodes.title: Boss Bailey

episodes.synopsis: When a new boy comes to Horseland, Bailey is thrilled to have a guy his own age to pal around with, forgetting that he has three good friends already.
episodes.title: Bailey's New Friend

episodes.synopsis: Tomboyish Alma has a crush on a boy. She goes to the other girls for advice on how to approach him -- and gets a wide range of opinions.
episodes.title: First Love

episodes.synopsis: When a blind girl comes to Horseland to ride, the kids find that their complaints pale in comparison to her lack of sight.
episodes.title: A True Gift

episodes.synopsis: Molly just doesn't get along with Chloe's horse, Chili. So, when circumstances force them together for a long trail ride, the tension is palpable.
episodes.title: Molly & Chili

episodes.synopsis: A wild horse is brought to Horseland for gentling, and fills Aztec's head with tales of how great it is to be free in the wild.
episodes.title: Wild Horses

episodes.synopsis: One night in the meadow, Chili meets a shaman-like horse who teaches Chili a lesson about how the herd instinct is beneficial for the whole group.
episodes.title: Magic In the Moonlit Meadow

episodes.synopsis: When a friend's beloved horse becomes unrideable after a jumping accident, everything depends on Sarah's ability to gentle the intractable stallion.
episodes.title: The Horse Whisperer

episodes.synopsis: Sarah has formed a bond with a reclusive old stable cat. The Horseland animals love him, too. When Mosey dies, Sarah has real trouble with the loss.
episodes.title: Mosey

episodes.synopsis: When things go missing, circumstantial evidence points to Sarah. At first, only Chloe and Zoey blame her, but soon, the other kids begin to wonder.
episodes.title: The Big Parade

episodes.synopsis: Hardhearted Zoey develops affection for an injured bird, which she nurses back to health. She has trouble parting with the bird once it is well again.
episodes.title: The Bluebird of Happiness

episodes.synopsis: An egotistical designer comes to Horseland to photograph his new line of riding clothing for a trendy magazine, and wants the kids to be his models.
episodes.title: Riding In Style

episodes.synopsis: A few of the Horseland kids fly to France for an exhibition. Sarah's dad wants her to befriend a rider from India, but the two have trouble bonding.
episodes.title: International Sarah

episodes.synopsis: Alma tries to change her riding style to compete against an opponent from another stable. At the same time, Chloe and Zoey try to learn to be nice.
episodes.title: Changing Spots

episodes.synopsis: Alma mistakenly thinks Molly is spreading malicious gossip about Sarah. The gossip has a toxic effect on all friendships.
episodes.title: The Whispering Gallery

episodes.synopsis: Sarah's cousin Marty comes to visit as Horseland prepares an anniversary celebration.
episodes.title: The Secret

episodes.synopsis: Nani Cloud, a Native American Cherokee girl, and her Paint horse, Sunburst, come to Horseland.
episodes.title: Newbies

episodes.synopsis: The kids are stunned to learn that a new resort is being built on land adjacent to Horseland.
episodes.title: A New Development

episodes.synopsis: Bailey finds an abandoned puppy he names Cubby and brings him home to Horseland.
episodes.title: New Pup in Town

episodes.synopsis: A revered race horse named River is coming to Horseland to recuperate from an operation.
episodes.title: A Horse Named River

episodes.synopsis: All the kids are practicing voluntary conservation to help stave off water rationing except for Chloe, which bothers Zoey.
episodes.title: The Last Drop

episodes.synopsis: Chloe and Zoey are thrilled to be able to run Horseland's Web site, but their reporting rarely sticks to the truth, and rumors are spread.
episodes.title: No News Is Good News

episodes.synopsis: Molly gets her first cell phone, and loves it. But can she stop chatting long enough to care for Calypso and spend time with her friends?
episodes.title: Talk, Talk

episodes.synopsis: When twin foals are born at a neighboring stable, they're brought to stay at Horseland while their sick mother gets better.
episodes.title: Oh, Baby

episodes.synopsis: The Horseland gang is set to ride in a "Heritage Days" parade. But they can't decide on what sort of heritage they'll represent.
episodes.title: Heritage Days

episodes.synopsis: Princess Linnea and her assistant come to ride for a day at Horseland.
episodes.title: The Princess

episodes.synopsis: When her friends tease her about her weight, Pepper becomes worried and goes on an unhealthy crash diet.
episodes.title: Added Weight

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and Alma try to convince the constantly bickering Stilton twins to tell each other "I love you."
episodes.title: Sister, Sister
